required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of COR388 HCl in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Single Ascending Dose Study of COR388 HCl

brief_summary.textblock: The study is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, dose escalation, first-in-human trial of the safety and tolerability of COR388 HCl in healthy male and female subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration curve (AUC)
Time of the first occurrence of the maximum observed plasma concentration (Tmax)

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of treatment emergent adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of the incidence and severity of treatment-emergent adverse events.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in chemistry lab measures (Sodium [Na], Blood Urea Nitrogen [BUN], Calcium [Ca], Total bilirubin).
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes in serum chemistry measures.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in hematology lab measures (RBC, Hgb, Hct).
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes in hematology measures.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in urinalysis lab parameters (pH, specific gravity, glucose).
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes in urinalysis parameters.
